trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was watching fireworks at a friend's home in dallas, pennsylvania and looked up into the sky. i observed a red\orange round object, that i though was a firework. as i was waiting for the "firework" to go off, it didn't. it continued to travel across the sky, slowly, in a straight line, moving southwest directionally. everyone else at this fouth of july party observed the object as well (about 10 people) and no one could identify it. no one even had a guess. i was awestruck. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. everyone else felt the same way. no one really knew how to react. eventually the object continued in a southwest direction until it was out of sight. it did not disappear behind a cloud or change direction; it simply just continued its flight out of sight. a few minutes later another person at the party stated he saw a satelite traveling in the same direction that disappeared behind a cloud, but i did not see this. before i could get a camera the object was gone.
Summary: Reddish/orange circular object traveled across the sky.
